price: (Lut) kaa sε: ”Na anka me wͻ ahoͻden bi a metumi de asi mo (dwumadi bɔne yi) ho kwan, anaasε menya mmoa kεseε bi (de asi mo kwan)
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
